经典布局方案的重点在于用**AntdLayout**包裹嵌套其他经典布局组件，从.en-us: The classic layout solution is focused on wrapping other classic layout components in **AntdLayout**. This makes it easy to build common classic page layout solutions.

侧边栏方位可调整。.en-us: The sidebar position can be adjusted.

为**AntdSider**设置`collapsible=True`开启自带的侧.en-us: Enable the collapsible feature of **AntdSider** by setting `collapsible=True`.

侧边栏可以指定屏幕宽度断点为阈值进行自动折叠及展开。.en-us: The sidebar can be collapsed and expanded at different screen width breakpoints.

侧边栏折叠可联动内部的导航菜单组件。.en-us: The sidebar can be linked to the inner navigation menu component.

设置`trigger=None`后可自定义控件配合回调函数控制侧边栏折叠状态。.en-us: Set `trigger=None` to customize the control with callback function to control the sidebar collapse state.
